text: @skyjlv The irony of it all. If you think I laughed in the sense of "Ha ha Japan drowned" you'd be dead wrong considering I had friends admist the actual travesty and was quite poorly impacted on a personal level. However, time has passed and even if it hadn't we all need to deal with disaster somehow and me freaking and saying I'm sorry about something I had no control over wouldn't help. Only thing I can and could do was cheer myself up and humor helps with that a lot. PS, friends are A-OK. :)

text:
Eighth view!
After a good decade that couldn't have lasted longer, Sonic's making a comeback. Sonic 4, Colors, and from the looks of it, Generations are all as great as the old games.
author: GameMasterGuy

text: I haven't played this game but I know it's actually a good entry in the Sonic franchise, which is always good to hear after all the failed attempts. Sonic Generations is looking pretty nice as well, I admit I'm mostly interested in the Classic gameplay over the Modern gameplay from the videos I've seen. That and I can't wait to check out the soundtrack, that Green Hill Zone remix sounded nice.
author: SupraDarky
